link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

form.name: form1

div.span: AT HOME INSTRUCTION CONTINUES THROUGH END OF SCHOOL YEAR

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:#000000

p.span: The Governor has announced that students will not be returning to school buildings for the remainder of the school year; however, classes will continue through the last scheduled day of school.Homework will continue to be available using the

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:#000000
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:#000000

p.span: link on the district’s home page (below).

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:#000000
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:#000000
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Grab and Go Meals for the week will be available on Mondays.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to place an online order and choose one of eight locations your food will be available. Order deadlines are on the Thursday prior to the Monday Grab and Go Meal day. Phone orders are also accepted at 937-859-5121, ext. 1131.

br.p: Open Enrollment applications for students living outside of the West Carrollton School District are being accepted through Friday, May 29. CLICK HERE for details.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

div.span: 430 E. Pease Avenue West Carrollton, OH 45449 Phone: 937.859.5121
